artist: Artist: Sylvain Sauvage; Author: Anatole France; Translator: Mrs. Wilfred Jackson; Publisher: The Limited Editions Club; Printer: The Lakeside Press, Chicago
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: full blue linen, gold-stamped lettering; designs printed in white (spine) and pink (sides); endpapers: white wove; slip case: red paper over over cardboard, printed label affixed; type: Monotype Centaur; 208 pp.
title: At the Sign of the Queen
